casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Goldsmith, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Goldsmith, 123 Ohio St.3d 162, 2009-Ohio-4906.]

(No. 2009-0001 Submitted August 11, 2009 Decided September 22, 2009.)

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Harris, 122 Ohio St.3d 373, 2009-Ohio-3323, 911 N.E.2d 882.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur. *163William D. Mason, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Kristen L. Sobieski, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. Antonio Goldsmith, pro se.
